name: tunneler
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
someone that digs a tunnel (= a long passage under or through the ground): Tunnelers have worked under pressure before, but never in such unstable ground conditions. The tunnelers cannot use a machine like the ones used in the Channel tunnel work. See
tunnel
More examplesFewer examplesLand Rovers patrol the site to deter tunnelers burrowing their way in.The tunnelers map the length and direction of the tunnel using satellite pictures.Specialist cavers and tunnelers now have to dig alongside them.
